statements: SELECT * FROM shipments
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM shipments
SELECT shipment_id, manufacturer, quantity FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY arrival_date DESC
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) as total_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY manufacturer
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE shipment_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY arrival_date DESC
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10 AND shipment_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(shipment_id) AS total_shipments FROM shipments GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_shipments > 2 ORDER BY total_shipments DESC
SELECT product_name, arrival_date FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY arrival_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT shipment_id, shipment_status FROM shipments WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Inc' OR manufacturer = 'XYZ Corp' ORDER BY shipment_status
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT shipment_id, quantity, product_name FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM shipments WHERE received_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity, received_date FROM shipments ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT qc.check_id, qc.shipment_id, qc.check_date, qc.passed, s.product_name FROM quality_checks qc INNER JOIN shipments s ON qc.shipment_id = s.shipment_id WHERE passed = true;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY received_date DESC, shipment_id ASC
SELECT shipment_id, product_name FROM shipments JOIN quality_checks ON shipments.shipment_id = quality_checks.shipment_id WHERE passed = TRUE
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shipments GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 500
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE check_date >= '2022-01-01' AND reason IS NOT NULL ORDER BY check_date DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_shipments FROM shipments
SELECT * FROM shipment_checks;
SELECT shipment_id, check_type FROM shipment_checks ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, quantity FROM shipment_products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT shipment_id, check_type, check_date FROM shipment_checks WHERE check_type = 'Safety';
SELECT * FROM check_results ORDER BY result_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM shipment_checks WHERE check_type='Quality Check';
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity FROM shipment_products WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT check_id, check_type, DATE_FORMAT(check_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM shipment_checks ORDER BY check_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, COUNT(product_id) AS total_products FROM shipment_products GROUP BY shipment_id HAVING total_products > 3;
SELECT cr.check_id, cr.result_type, cr.result_description, sc.check_type FROM check_results cr INNER JOIN shipment_checks sc ON cr.check_id = sc.check_id WHERE cr.result_type='Pass';
SELECT * FROM shipments;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, arrival_date FROM shipments ORDER BY arrival_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, product_name, quantity, arrival_date FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT shipments.shipment_id, quality_checks.check_type, quality_checks.check_result FROM shipments JOIN quality_checks ON shipments.shipment_id = quality_checks.shipment_id;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY arrival_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM shipments GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 100 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC;

SELECT shipments.shipment_id, quality_checks.check_type, reports.report_details FROM shipments JOIN quality_checks ON shipments.shipment_id = quality_checks.shipment_id JOIN reports ON quality_checks.check_id = reports.check_id WHERE shipments.arrival_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT inspector_name, COUNT(report_id) AS total_reports FROM inspectors JOIN reports ON inspectors.inspector_id = reports.inspector_id GROUP BY inspector_name ORDER BY total_reports DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT product_name FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id IN (SELECT shipment_id FROM quality_checks WHERE check_result = 'Passed');
SELECT * FROM shipments
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM shipments
SELECT arrival_date, product_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM shipments
SELECT * FROM quality_checks WHERE pass_status = true
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers
SELECT * FROM products WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT supplier_name, product_name, quantity FROM shipments WHERE arrival_date > '2022-06-01';
SELECT shipment_id, pass_status, remarks FROM quality_checks WHERE pass_status = TRUE;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipment.supplier_name, product_name, quantity, arrival_date FROM shipments JOIN products ON shipments.product_name = products.product_name;
